about_the_game:
ABOUT THE GAME

A steamy Visual Novel featuring high-definition graphics and realistic-looking characters set in beautiful decor.
The story continues with Nikki going to the Spa to relax, only to end up fucked senseless in the steamy sauna by a hunk of a man who doesn’t even bother telling her his name.
Will Adam enjoy being a cuckold for his slutty wife again?
Follow the Sex Story and find out!

GAME DESCRIPTION

Meet Nikki & Adam, and embark on their journey of spicing up their marital life in a brand new and wild cuckold Sex Story.

EPISODE 4
Nothing beats ending a stressful workday like basking in Sienna’s luxurious oils. So when Nikki receives her friend’s invitation to check out her newly renovated Spa, she accepts on the spot.
Of course, the slutty wife cannot let an opportunity like this slide. She puts on something sexy and taunts her husband with naughty promises before caging his cock with a scrotum ring and leaving to meet her sexy friend at the Spa.

The evening takes an interesting turn when she enters the steamy sauna to find a very endowed nudist enjoying the hot steam, and she can’t keep her arousal in check.

Will Adam enjoy being a cuckold for his slutty wife again?
Follow their Sex Story and find out!

content_descriptors.notes: The game graphically depicts sex in still images among male/female characters.
